Structs/TaxItem.html#/s:vV11MyCheckDine7.name: amount
Structs/TaxItem.html#/s:vV11MyCheckDine7.abstract: The amount od currancy that will be charged

Structs/TaxItem.html#/s:vV11MyCheckDine7.name: isInclusive
Structs/TaxItem.html#/s:vV11MyCheckDine7.abstract: Whether or not the tax is included in the items price

Structs/PaymentDetails.html#/s:vV11MyChe.name: tip
Structs/PaymentDetails.html#/s:vV11MyChe.abstract: The tip for the payment. The tip can be edited after creation

Structs/PaymentDetails.html#/s:FV11MyChe.name: init(order:amount:tip:)
Structs/PaymentDetails.html#/s:FV11MyChe.abstract: Create a new payment request for the underlying order supplied. If the amount is bigger than the order balance or if the order is not open nil will be returned.

Structs/PaymentDetails.html#/s:FV11MyChe.name: init(order:items:tip:)
Structs/PaymentDetails.html#/s:FV11MyChe.abstract: Create a new payment request for the underlying order supplied. The amount will be calculated as the sum of all the unpaid items. If the order is not open or if the sum is larger than the balance nil will be returned.

Structs/PaymentDetails.html#/s:FV11MyChe.name: init(order:tip:)
Structs/PaymentDetails.html#/s:FV11MyChe.abstract: Create a new payment request for the underlying order supplied. The amount to be paid will be eqaul to the total amount of the bill. If the order is not open or if the sum is larger than the balance nil will be returned.

Structs/Settings.html#/s:vV11MyCheckDine.name: splitEnabled
Structs/Settings.html#/s:vV11MyCheckDine.abstract: whether or not splitting the bill is allowed in this order. If not, only a full payment of the bill will be accepted

Structs/Settings.html#/s:vV11MyCheckDine.name: quickService
Structs/Settings.html#/s:vV11MyCheckDine.abstract: whether or not this order is a quick service order (over the counter purchase)

Structs/TaxSettings.html#/s:vV11MyCheckD.name: percentage
Structs/TaxSettings.html#/s:vV11MyCheckD.abstract: The percentage of the total amount that must be charged as tax.

Structs/UserSummary.html#/s:vV11MyCheckD.name: paidAmount
Structs/UserSummary.html#/s:vV11MyCheckD.abstract: The amount already paid by the user.

Structs/UserSummary.html#/s:vV11MyCheckD.name: paidTip
Structs/UserSummary.html#/s:vV11MyCheckD.abstract: The amount of tip the user paid

Structs/Bill.html#/s:vV11MyCheckDine4Bil.name: paidAmount
Structs/Bill.html#/s:vV11MyCheckDine4Bil.abstract: The amount paid in total from the bill.

Structs/Bill.html#/s:vV11MyCheckDine4Bil.name: userSummary
Structs/Bill.html#/s:vV11MyCheckDine4Bil.abstract: Information about the currant users payments in the bill.

Structs/Bill.html#/s:vV11MyCheckDine4Bil.name: taxAmount
Structs/Bill.html#/s:vV11MyCheckDine4Bil.abstract: The amount (in the currency the venue is using) of tax that must be charge.

Structs/Bill.html.name: Bill
Structs/Bill.html.abstract: Holds the information about the tax in the currant order.

Structs/UserSummary.html.name: UserSummary
Structs/UserSummary.html.abstract: Holds information about the logged in users payments.

Structs/TaxSettings.html.name: TaxSettings
Structs/TaxSettings.html.abstract: Holds the information about the tax in the currant order.

Structs/Settings.html.name: Settings
Structs/Settings.html.abstract: Holds general settings related to the venue.

Structs/PaymentDetails.html.name: PaymentDetails
Structs/PaymentDetails.html.abstract: A request represents a payment on a specific order.

Structs/TaxItem.html.name: TaxItem
Structs/TaxItem.html.abstract: Information about a specific type of tax that will be charged as part of an order.

Structs.html#/s:V11MyCheckDine14UserStat.name: UserStatistics
Structs.html#/s:V11MyCheckDine14UserStat.abstract: Various statistics about the users usage behaviour, that might interest him/her to see

Protocols/OrderPollerDelegate.html#/s:FP.name: failingToReceiveUpdates(lastReceivedError:failCount:)
Protocols/OrderPollerDelegate.html#/s:FP.abstract: Called when the poller fails to receive updates. It is not called on every failed call but rather after a few consecutive fails

Protocols/OrderPollerDelegate.html.name: OrderPollerDelegate
Protocols/OrderPollerDelegate.html.abstract: This delegate will be updated on changes to the users order.

Enums/Status.html#/s:FO11MyCheckDine6Sta.name: closed
Enums/Status.html#/s:FO11MyCheckDine6Sta.abstract: Sandbox environment. mimics the behaviour of the production environment but allows the use of test payment methods and user accounts.

Enums/Status.html#/s:FO11MyCheckDine6Sta.name: canceled
Enums/Status.html#/s:FO11MyCheckDine6Sta.abstract: The latest version of the Server code. The code will work with sandbox and test payment methods like the sandbox environment. It might have new untested and unstable code. Should not be used without consulting with a member of the MyCheck team first!

Classes/OrderPoller.html#/s:FC11MyCheckD.name: startPolling()
Classes/OrderPoller.html#/s:FC11MyCheckD.abstract: Should be called in order to start polling. Make sure to set a delegate in order to receive order updates.

Classes/OrderPoller.html#/s:FC11MyCheckD.name: stopPolling()
Classes/OrderPoller.html#/s:FC11MyCheckD.abstract: Should be called in order to stop polling. You might still receive a response after it is called in the case that a call was already dispached to the server.

Classes/OrderPoller.html#/s:FC11MyCheckD.name: isPolling()
Classes/OrderPoller.html#/s:FC11MyCheckD.abstract: Returns weather the poller is on or not.

Classes/Order.html#/s:vC11MyCheckDine5Or.name: restaurantId
Classes/Order.html#/s:vC11MyCheckDine5Or.abstract: The Id of the restaurant the order belongs to.

Classes/Order.html#/s:vC11MyCheckDine5Or.name: openTime
Classes/Order.html#/s:vC11MyCheckDine5Or.abstract: The date time the order was opened.

Classes/Order.html#/s:vC11MyCheckDine5Or.name: clientCode
Classes/Order.html#/s:vC11MyCheckDine5Or.abstract: The 4 digit code used by the client to connect to the POS.

Classes/Order.html#/s:vC11MyCheckDine5Or.name: tax
Classes/Order.html#/s:vC11MyCheckDine5Or.abstract: Information about the tax in the currant bill.

Classes/Order.html#/s:vC11MyCheckDine5Or.name: settings
Classes/Order.html#/s:vC11MyCheckDine5Or.abstract: General settings related to the order’s venue.

Classes/Item.html#/s:vC11MyCheckDine4Ite.name: validForReorder
Classes/Item.html#/s:vC11MyCheckDine4Ite.abstract: Is this item allowed to be reorders.

Classes/Item.html#/s:vC11MyCheckDine4Ite.name: showInReorder
Classes/Item.html#/s:vC11MyCheckDine4Ite.abstract: Should this item be displayed in the reorder list.

Classes/Dine/PaymentResponse.html#/s:vVC.name: fullyPaid
Classes/Dine/PaymentResponse.html#/s:vVC.abstract: True iff the order was fully paid

Classes/Dine.html#/s:ZvC11MyCheckDine4Di.name: shared
Classes/Dine.html#/s:ZvC11MyCheckDine4Di.abstract: This property points to the singleton object. It should be used for calling all the functions in the class.

Classes/Dine.html#/s:FC11MyCheckDine4Din.name: createNewPoller(delegate:)
Classes/Dine.html#/s:FC11MyCheckDine4Din.abstract: Creates a new order poller. When activated this object polls the MyCheck server in order to fetch order updates. Make sure to hold a reference to the returned object for as long as you want it to send you order update events.

Classes/Dine.html#/s:FC11MyCheckDine4Din.name: generateCode(hotelId:restaurantId:displayDelegate:applePayController:success:fail:)
Classes/Dine.html#/s:FC11MyCheckDine4Din.abstract: The code generated by the MyCheck server is valid for a limited time, for a specific user in a specific location. The server returns a 4 digit code to the recipient. This code, when entered into the POS enables MyCheck to sync the client with his order on the POS and can start receiving order updates and perform actions on it. When Apple Pay is the default payment method, a pending payment Apple Pay token must be created. In order to enable this functionality you MUST set the displayDelegate and ApplePayController parameters

Classes/Dine/PaymentResponse.html.name: PaymentResponse
Classes/Dine/PaymentResponse.html.abstract: Returns information about the order after the payment

Classes/Dine.html#/s:FC11MyCheckDine4Din.name: generatePaymentRequest(paymentDetails:success:fail:)
Classes/Dine.html#/s:FC11MyCheckDine4Din.abstract: Use this function to understand the payment details before making the payment. Specificly the Tax, subtotal and total amounts that will be paid. This is a obligatory action before payment.

Classes/Dine.html#/s:FC11MyCheckDine4Din.name: reorderItems(items:success:fail:)
Classes/Dine.html#/s:FC11MyCheckDine4Din.abstract: Place an order to the POS. The items sent will be reordered and served to the user. This will only succeed if their is an open order.

Classes/Dine.html#/s:FC11MyCheckDine4Din.name: getFriendsListAtOpenTable(success:fail:)
Classes/Dine.html#/s:FC11MyCheckDine4Din.abstract: Get the list of friends that have joint the table. Friends can join by showing a generated 4 digit code to the waiter or to a friend that has already joined the table (using the add friend functions).

Classes/Dine.html#/s:FC11MyCheckDine4Din.name: addFriendToOpenTable(friendCode:success:fail:)
Classes/Dine.html#/s:FC11MyCheckDine4Din.abstract: Adds a friend to your users currantly open table

Classes/Dine.html#/s:FC11MyCheckDine4Din.name: getUserStatistics(success:fail:)
Classes/Dine.html#/s:FC11MyCheckDine4Din.abstract: Responds with various statistics about the currant users buying habits using MyCheck.

Classes/Dine.html#/s:FC11MyCheckDine4Din.name: getOrderHistoryList(success:fail:)
Classes/Dine.html#/s:FC11MyCheckDine4Din.abstract: Responds with a list of all the past payments of the user.

Classes/Dine.html#/s:FC11MyCheckDine4Din.name: getPastOrder(orderId:success:fail:)
Classes/Dine.html#/s:FC11MyCheckDine4Din.abstract: Returns the order details of a specific order. . This call is mainly meant for getting past orders.

Classes/Dine.html#/s:FC11MyCheckDine4Din.name: callWaiter(success:fail:)
Classes/Dine.html#/s:FC11MyCheckDine4Din.abstract: Use this function to call a waiter to the table. A 4 digit code must be generated and a table opened in order for this to work. This function is not supported in all venues and must have a POS that supports this functionality.

Classes/Dine.html#/s:FC11MyCheckDine4Din.name: sendFeedback(for:stars:comment:success:fail:)
Classes/Dine.html#/s:FC11MyCheckDine4Din.abstract: Sends feedback regarding the last order. The feedback is always for 2 questions, one on a scale of 0-5 and one is free text.

Classes/Benefits.html#/s:ZFC11MyCheckDin.name: getBenefits(restaurantId:success:fail:)
Classes/Benefits.html#/s:ZFC11MyCheckDin.abstract: Returns the list of benefits that can be displayed to the user.

Classes/Benefit.html#/s:OC11MyCheckDine7.name: RedeemMethod
Classes/Benefit.html#/s:OC11MyCheckDine7.abstract: The method the benefit can be redeemed by.

Classes/Benefit.html#/s:vC11MyCheckDine7.name: imageURL
Classes/Benefit.html#/s:vC11MyCheckDine7.abstract: A url of an image for the benefit

Classes/Benefit.html#/s:vC11MyCheckDine7.name: redeemMethod
Classes/Benefit.html#/s:vC11MyCheckDine7.abstract: The method the benefit can be redeemed by (by calling the redeem function or automaticly)

Classes/Benefit.html#/s:vC11MyCheckDine7.name: startDate
Classes/Benefit.html#/s:vC11MyCheckDine7.abstract: The date the benefit begins to be valid

Classes/BasicItem.html#/s:vC11MyCheckDin.name: name
Classes/BasicItem.html#/s:vC11MyCheckDin.abstract: The name of the item as it was received from the POS.

Classes/BasicItem.html#/s:vC11MyCheckDin.name: quantity
Classes/BasicItem.html#/s:vC11MyCheckDin.abstract: The amount of the item. At present this will always be 1. If more than 1 item is ordered , multiple Items of the same kind will appear in the bill.

Classes/BasicItem.html#/s:vC11MyCheckDin.name: modifiers
Classes/BasicItem.html#/s:vC11MyCheckDin.abstract: modifiers of the item. This can be a list of toppings or any other kind of complementary item.

Classes/BasicItem.html.name: BasicItem
Classes/BasicItem.html.abstract: Represents A single item in an order , or a modifier of an item.

Classes/Benefits.html.name: Benefits
Classes/Benefits.html.abstract: This object enables the ability to query the list of benefits that can be displyed to the user and redeem them if the benefit’s type allowes it.

Classes/Dine.html.name: Dine
Classes/Dine.html.abstract: Dine is a singleton That encapsulates the MyCheck dine in proccess: from opening a table , through getting the order details and reordering items to paying for the order.

Classes/Item.html.name: Item
Classes/Item.html.abstract: Represents A single item in an order , or a modifier of an item.

Classes/Order.html.name: Order
Classes/Order.html.abstract: Represents an order in a venue. The order includes the orders status , bill information and some general information.

Classes/OrderPoller.html.name: OrderPoller
Classes/OrderPoller.html.abstract: When activated this object polls the MyCheck server in order to fetch order updates. Call The startPolling function and set the delegate in order to receive updates. You should generaly use the poller from when a 4 digit code is created untill the order is closed or canceled.
